comment._content: Frederick Harris Goff, banker from Cleveland; his gravesite: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=5370

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Confirming portrait as frontispiece of a 1951 lecture on Goff's life by I.H. Freiburger books.google.com/books?id=eR_SQx10NMkC&pg=PA3&sou...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: As founder of The Cleveland Foundation, he testified regarding the the bona fides of his foundation and the Rockefeller Foundation to the Walsh Commission (Commission on Industrial Relations) in a hearing on February 2, 1915 at the Metropolitan Building in New York. (Bain has a series of photos, likely taken in that building on that day of Commission witnesses.) query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00E12F83E5C13738...

comment._content: Very nice photo, reminds me of an Avedon expression shots
